DOC.detailed_description: The design current study conduct retrospective analysis prolong heart rate uncontrolled tachycardia use patient enrol investigator prospective observational cohort study since electronic medical record system implement . The investigator know period electronic system fail , result lose data . The investigator anticipate retrospective collection hourly heart rate approximately 400 SAH patient ICU data 3 month modify Rankin document Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Outcomes Project ( SHOP ) database . The investigator determine percent prolong elevated heart rate tachycardia . Prolonged heart rate uncontrolled tachycardia define heart rate great 95 great 12 hour one 24 hour period ICU stay . The investigator conduct ROC curve analysis determine appropriate heart rate duration threshold predictive poor prognosis SAH . Patients stratify base several criterion include admission coma score , early ( SAH day 0 3 ) late ( SAH day > =4 ) ICU admission , presence intraventricular hemorrhage admission CT , history beta-blocker usage , age , gender .
